due_time.title: Due Time
due_time.description: Time in HH:MM format (e.g., 14:30). Use with due_date for date+time.

ref_type.title: Reference Type
ref_type.description: Type of object to link task to: 'item', 'status', 'task', or 'space'

ref_id.title: Reference ID
ref_id.description: ID of the object to link the task to

responsible.title: Responsible User ID
responsible.description: User ID of the person responsible for the task

private.title: Private
private.description: True to make the task private

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Array of label texts or IDs

file_ids.title: File IDs
file_ids.description: Array of file IDs to attach

remind_delta.title: Reminder (minutes)
remind_delta.description: Minutes before due date to send reminder
